issue.title: [C++] Arrow doesn't compile cleanly with Visual Studio 2017 Update 9 or later due to narrowing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5242](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5242). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The std::string constructor call here is narrowing wchar_t to char, which emits warning C4244 on current releases of Visual Studio: <https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/src/arrow/vendored/datetime/tz.cpp#L205>
